title: [Large-Scale] Mixed-Methods Research and Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) Application for Advancing UK Higher Education Learning Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education knowledge and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Course for current practitioners to integrate Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) into elementary science education. Emphasizes self-directed learning and collaboration via LMS in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Analyze learning technology requirements in elementary science education settings using mixed research methodologies
Design flexible science experiment activities by applying Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) tools
Develop LMS-based formative assessment strategies to improve learner engagement by over 20%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
